Pre-Game Insights: Bafana and Uganda are level on 7 points after three matches in Group K
Miscellaneous Highlights: The clash between Bafana and Congo will take place at the Stade Alphonse Massamba- Debat de Brazzavile which feature a synthetic pitch
Others: Bafana coach Hugo Broos has voiced out his concern about the pitch following their light training session where a light drizzle helped to cool down the scorching daytime temperatures
